entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:22 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
